modName: TestENB for Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting
summary: This is my ENB config for Project Reality - Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][font=Impact]-- TestENB for Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting --[/size][/font]


[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/23240-1-1348428823.png[/img]


[font=Impact][size=5][u]Requirements:[/u][/size][/font]

1. First download the ENB binary (0.119) from enbdev.com and install into your Skyrim Directory.
[url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]Click here!
[/url]
2. Extract TestENB into your skyrim Directory > overwrite 

3. (SKIP THIS IF YOU WANT USE MY INI-SETTINGS)
   Set in SkyrimPrefs.ini (in Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim)
   bFloatPointRenderTarget=1 
   bTreesReceiveShadows=1
   bDrawLandShadows=1
   bShadowsOnGrass=1 

4. Then download and install Project Reality - Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting 2.1
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]Click here![/url]

5. After that download and install Overhaulin lights sources for ENB and Vanilla with striping fixes[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12638]
Click here![/url]

6. (OPTIONAL) 
Back up your skyrim.ini and SkyrimPrefs.ini first then use mine.
Set in SkyrimPrefs.ini (in Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim)
sD3DDevice=\"Copy this line from your old SkyrimPrefs.ini  \"
iSize W=Copy this line from your old SkyrimPrefs.ini
iSize H=Copy this line  from your old SkyrimPrefs.ini

Set in Skyrim.ini (in Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim)
[Archive]
Copy these lines from your old skyrim.ini

[font=Impact][size=5][u]Highly recommended mods:[/u][/size][/font]

WATER - Water And Terrain Enhancement Redux
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13268]Link![/url] 

Enhanced Night Skyrim (blue galaxy)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/85]Link![/url]

HD Cinematic Fire Effects
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2692]Link![/url]

Real Effect Candle (softer version)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7643]Link![/url]

Skyrim Flora Overhaul
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/141]Link![/url]

Less Intrusive Candle Light Spell (textures only, but you can also try esp)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5297]Link![/url]

[size=4][b][u]Load order:[/u][/b][/size]

ClimatesOfTamriel.esm
Dark Dungeons for ENB.esp
ClimatesOfTamriel-Dungeons-Hardcore 
ClimatesOfTamriel-Interiors-Cold.esp
ClimatesOfTamriel-VanillaNights-Lvl-1.esp
OLSE.esp
